snippet: Eddie Howe believes Chelsea will not be significantly weakened by the absence of leading scorer Diego Costa and midfielder N'Golo Kante when they host his Bournemouth team in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: Chelsea Won't Miss Suspended Duo, Says Bournemouth's Howe
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Won't Miss Suspended Duo, Says Bournemouth's Howe

lead_paragraph: Eddie Howe believes Chelsea will not be significantly weakened by the absence of leading scorer Diego Costa and midfielder N'Golo Kante when they host his Bournemouth team in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Former England boss Sam Allardyce has signed a 2-1/2 year contract to take over as manager of Premier League strugglers Crystal Palace, the London club said on Friday....

headline.main: Palace Appoint Former England Manager Allardyce
headline.print_headline: Palace Appoint Former England Manager Allardyce

lead_paragraph: Former England boss Sam Allardyce has signed a 2-1/2 year contract to take over as manager of Premier League strugglers Crystal Palace, the London club said on Friday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur have improved on last season's Premier League title push but the searing pace being set at the top by Chelsea means defeat in Wednesday's home clash with their London rivals could consign them to also-rans with half the season re...

headline.main: Improved Tottenham Face Massive Game at Home to Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Improved Tottenham Face Massive Game at Home to Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur have improved on last season's Premier League title push but the searing pace being set at the top by Chelsea means defeat in Wednesday's home clash with their London rivals could consign them to also-rans with half the season remaining.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion and Watford have been fined 45,000 pounds apiece by the FA after admitting to a misconduct charge for failing to control their players during a Premier League game on Dec. 3....

headline.main: West Brom and Watford Fined by FA
headline.print_headline: West Brom and Watford Fined by FA

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion and Watford have been fined 45,000 pounds apiece by the FA after admitting to a misconduct charge for failing to control their players during a Premier League game on Dec. 3.

snippet: Hull City have given a one-year contract extension to Scotland international Robert Snodgrass and five other players, the Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: Snodgrass and Five Other Hull Players Extend Contracts
headline.print_headline: Snodgrass and Five Other Hull Players Extend Contracts

lead_paragraph: Hull City have given a one-year contract extension to Scotland international Robert Snodgrass and five other players, the Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: Chelsea equalled Arsenal's Premier League record of 13 consecutive wins in the same season on Saturday, goals from Gary Cahill, Diego Costa and two from Willian bringing the leaders a 4-2 win over Stoke City....

headline.main: Chelsea Equal Winning Record With 4-2 Victory Over Stoke
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Equal Winning Record With 4-2 Victory Over Stoke

lead_paragraph: Chelsea equalled Arsenal's Premier League record of 13 consecutive wins in the same season on Saturday, goals from Gary Cahill, Diego Costa and two from Willian bringing the leaders a 4-2 win over Stoke City.

snippet: Andre Gray celebrated his maiden Premier League hat-trick as Burnley headed into the New Year sitting comfortably in mid-table after a 4-1 demolition of struggling Sunderland at Turf Moor on Saturday....

headline.main: Gray Grabs Hat-Trick as Burnley Thrash Sunderland
headline.print_headline: Gray Grabs Hat-Trick as Burnley Thrash Sunderland

lead_paragraph: Andre Gray celebrated his maiden Premier League hat-trick as Burnley headed into the New Year sitting comfortably in mid-table after a 4-1 demolition of struggling Sunderland at Turf Moor on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester United's in-house television channel received a shock when Usain Bolt called up to discuss Saturday's 2-1 win over Middlesbrough in the English Premier League....

headline.main: 'It Is Usain Bolt' _ Olympic Champ Calls Into Man United TV
headline.print_headline: 'It Is Usain Bolt' _ Olympic Champ Calls Into Man United TV

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's in-house television channel received a shock when Usain Bolt called up to discuss Saturday's 2-1 win over Middlesbrough in the English Premier League.

snippet: Premier League leaders Chelsea look "unbeatable", Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew said on Friday ahead of this weekend's game between the London rivals....
lead_paragraph: Premier League leaders Chelsea look "unbeatable", Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew said on Friday ahead of this weekend's game between the London rivals.

snippet: Bournemouth thrashed Swansea 3-0 with first-half strikes from Benik Afobe and Ryan Fraser followed by a late one from Joshua King on Saturday, leaving the Swans nailed to the bottom of the Premier League table....

headline.main: Bournemouth Add to Managerless Swansea's Misery With 3-0 Win
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Add to Managerless Swansea's Misery With 3-0 Win

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth thrashed Swansea 3-0 with first-half strikes from Benik Afobe and Ryan Fraser followed by a late one from Joshua King on Saturday, leaving the Swans nailed to the bottom of the Premier League table.
